name: Nightmare Trails
description:
THEY HAVE ARRIVED:Nightmare Trails throws you into a world now plagued by monsters from another dimension. Learn how they got here and send them back!INTRODUCTION:During a lonely road trip through a national park in the middle of the night, you are forced to stop when you see something in the road. It moves towards you and its eyes widen, staring at you. You enter a state of panic as the monster starts sprinting, you exit the vehicle and run to the a car park that leads deeper into the national park, but you soon realise, there is no safe place.WAVE SURVIVAL GAMEPLAY:Survive endless waves of monsters coming from all corners of the map and learn the best way to defeat each type of monster. How long can you survive before it becomes too much?PORTAL MODE GAMEPLAY:They won't stop coming! Destroy the monsters portal into this world and stop the invasion!FEATURES:- Addictive Monster Killing!

- Standard survival mode
- Portal mode
- Defensive building construction
- Low polygonal graphics
- Steam Leaderboards
- Steam achievements
